posts.post_content:
Looking to add some additional backs to my T206 Boston AL collection. I am interested in both graded and ungraded. I’m pretty flexible on condition, but try to avoid heavy paper loss and creasing (corners and surface creasing I’m not too concerned about). Below is what I have already. I’d be particularly interested in any more rare backs. I’m not a high roller on this stuff, so looking mainly in the $120 and under range. Thanks!

COMPLETE SET:
Arellanes, Frank - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 (SGC 40 VG 3)
Carrigan, Bill - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 (PSA 4 VG-EX)
Cicotte, Ed - Piedmont 150 Fact. 25 (SGC 50 VG/EX 4)
Kleinow, Red (Boston) - Tolstoi (SGC 40 VG 3)
Lord, Harry - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 (SGC 40 VG 3)
Niles, Harry - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 (SGC 50 VG/EX 4)
Smith, Frank (CHI/BOS) - Polar Bear (PSA 3 VG)
Speaker, Tris - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 (SGC 30 GOOD 2)
Spencer, Tubby - Sweet Caporal 150 Fact. 649 (PSA 2 GOOD)
Stahl, Jake (Glove Shows) - Sweet Caporal 350-460 (SGC 9 VG 3)
Stahl, Jake (No Glove) - Piedmont 150 Fact. 25 (PSA 4 VG-EX)
Wagner, Heinie (Right Sh) - Sweet Caporal 350 (PSA 2 GOOD)
Wagner, Heinie (Left Sh) - Sweet Caporal 150 (PSA 4 VG-EX)

OTHERS:
Niles, Harry (Topps 206 Buyback) - Piedmont 150 Fact. 25
Stahl, Jake (Glove Shows) - Polar Bear (Raw, Low Grade)
Stahl, Jake (No Glove) - Sweet Caporal 150 Fact 30 (PSA 2 GOOD)
Stahl, Jake (No Glove) - Sweet Caporal 350 Fact 35
Wagner, Heinie (Right Sh) - Piedmont 350-460 Fact 25 (Raw)
Wagner, Heinie (Right Sh) - Polar Bear (Raw)
